title: goinstall: work with any Git/Hg server
body:
by **alexander.surma**: 
I think it would be a good idea if goinstall handled anything that starts with http://
or has a valid TLD before a / as a remote repository, sniffs whether it is hg or git and
installs it like it does already with a few free services like github et al.
Sometimes though, those publicly accessible repos are not an option due to closed source
material and people should still be able to use advantage for goinstall.
